title: Was a construction company for all females responsible for the collapse of the financial intelligence unit bridge?
subtitle: It is reported that a construction company composed of all females constructed a collapsed bridge at Florida International University on the basis of incomplete, inaccurate and misleading information.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The construction department of Monilla, the construction company that built the bridge at Florida International University, which collapsed in March 2018, is a women ' s company.
